SELECT /* PDMC0030.SEARCH00.제작 관리 화면 *//* [제작의뢰서테이블 조회] */ A.REQU_DATE /*제작의뢰일*/ , A.STAT_FLAG /*진행상태*/ , A.JOBN_NAME /*제작명*/ , A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ , A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ , B.CUST_NAME /*광고주명*/ , A.MEDA_CODE /*제작내용*/ , A.HIGH_LEVL /*제작종류*/ , A.USEX_TYPE /*제작용도*/ , A.DEND_DATE /*청구일자*/ , C.ESTI_AMTX /*견적금액*/ , C.DEND_AMTX /*청구금액*/ , C.SUJU_AMTX /*정산금액*/ , C.PREE_CODE /*견적번호*/ FROM PD_JOBNXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.JOBN_NUMB ,CASE WHEN NVL(B.JOBN_NUMB,'') IS NULL THEN MAX(A.PREE_CODE) ELSE MAX(B.PREE_CODE) END PREE_CODE ,CASE WHEN NVL(B.JOBN_NUMB,'') IS NULL THEN MAX(A.ESTI_AMTX) ELSE MAX(B.ESTI_AMTX) END ESTI_AMTX ,CASE WHEN NVL(B.JOBN_NUMB,'') IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE MAX(B.DEND_AMTX) END DEND_AMTX ,CASE WHEN NVL(B.JOBN_NUMB,'') IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE MAX(B.SUJU_AMTX) END SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_ESTIMH A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT JOBN_NUMB , PREE_CODE , ESTI_AMTX , DEND_AMTX , SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMH )B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY A.JOBN_NUMB, B.JOBN_NUMB )C ON A.JOBN_NUMB = C.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.REQU_DATE

SELECT /* PDMC0030.SEARCH01.제작 관리 화면 *//* [하단 견적 탭 조회] */ CASE WHEN C.JOBN_NUMB IS NULL THEN '견적용' ELSE '제작용' END PREE_FLAG /*견적여부*/ , A.ESTI_DATE /*견적일자*/ , B.JOBN_NAME /*제작명*/ , A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ , A.PREE_NAME /*견적명*/ , A.ESTI_AMTX /*견적금액*/ , CASE NVL(C.ESTI_AMTX,0) WHEN 0 THEN NVL(A.ESTI_AMTX,0) ELSE NVL(C.ESTI_AMTX,0) END AS ESTI_AMTX /*견적금액*/ , CASE WHEN B.DEND_DATE IS NULL THEN '미청구' ELSE '청구' END DEND_FLAG /*청구여부*/ FROM PD_ESTIMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN PD_SUJUMH C ON A.JOBN_NUMB = C.JOBN_NUMB AND A.PREE_CODE = C.PREE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB#

SELECT /* PDMC0030.SEARCH02.제작 관리 -견적상세 탭 조회*//* [제작견적서 견적 상세탭 조회] */ A.ESTI_DATE /*견적일자*/ ,A.PREE_NAME /*견적명*/ ,A.PREE_IDXX /*견적순번*/ ,A.PREE_CODE /*견적번호*/ ,A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ ,A.ITEM_CODE /*분류항목코드*/ ,B.HIGH_NAME /*대분류명*/ ,B.MIDD_NAME /*중분류명*/ ,B.SUBX_NAME /*소분류명 제작항목*/ ,A.MEMO_FILD /*내역*/ ,A.TYPE_QTYX /*수량*/ ,A.ESTI_PRCE /*단가*/ ,A.ESTI_AMTX /*금액*/ ,A.OUTS_CODE /*제작사코드*/ ,C.CUST_NAME /*제작사명*/ ,A.SORT_ORDR /*정렬순번*/ FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN VI_IF_MD_CUST C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# AND A.PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#

SELECT /* PDMC0030.SEARCH03_1.제작 관리 -외주정산 탭 조회*//* [제작관리 외주정산 탭 조회] */ A.PREE_CODE /*견적번호*/ ,A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ ,B.SUBX_NAME /*소분류명 제작항목*/ ,A.ESTI_AMTX /*금액*/ FROM PD_SUJUMD A /* [제작관리 외주정산 탭 조회] */ LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# AND A.PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#

SELECT /* PDMC0030.SEARCH03_2.제작 관리 -외주정산 조회*//* [제작관리 외주정산 상세탭 조회] */ A.OUTS_CODE /*제작사코드*/ ,C.CUST_NAME /*제작사명*/ ,B.SUBX_NAME /*소분류명 제작항목*/ ,A.MEMO_FILD /*내역*/ ,A.SUJU_AMTX /*정산금액*/ ,A.SUJU_DATE /*정산일자*/ ,A.CONT_NUMB /*계약서번호*/ ,D.CONT_NAME /*계약명*/ FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CONTXH D ON A.CONT_NUMB = D.CONT_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_OFFICE E ON E.ACCT_GUBN = '100' AND E.OFFI_GUBN ='1' WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(C.BIZR_NUMB,' ') <> E.BSNS_NUMB AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB#

SELECT /* PDMC0030.SEARCH04.제작 관리 -제작의뢰 탭 조회*//* [제작의뢰서 조회] */ A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ ,A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ ,F.CUST_NAME /*광고주명*/ ,A.CTIM_CODE /*광고주팀코드*/ ,G.CUST_NAME AS CTIM_NAME /*광고주팀명*/ ,A.JOBN_NAME /*제작명*/ ,A.REQU_DATE /*제작의뢰일*/ ,A.CUST_EMPL /*광고주담당자*/ ,A.PLAN_DEPT /*기획담당부서*/ ,B.DEPT_NAME AS PLAN_NAME /*기획담당부서명*/ ,A.PLAN_EMPL /*기획담당자*/ ,C.EMPL_NAME AS PLAN_EMPN /*기획담당자명*/ ,A.PROD_DEPT /*제작담당부서*/ ,D.DEPT_NAME AS PROD_NAME /*제작담당부서명*/ ,A.PROD_EMPL /*제작담당자*/ ,E.EMPL_NAME AS PROD_EMPN /*제작담당자명*/ ,A.MEDA_CODE /*제작내용*/ ,A.HIGH_LEVL /*제작종류*/ ,A.USEX_TYPE /*제작용도*/ ,A.JOBN_SIZE /*규격*/ ,A.COMP_DATE /*제작완료희망일*/ ,A.MEMO_FILD /*비고*/ ,A.DEND_DATE /*청구요청일*/ ,H.ITEM_CODE AS STAT_FLAG /*진행상태*/ FROM PD_JOBNXM A LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM B ON A.PLAN_DEPT = B.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN HR_MASTXM C ON A.PLAN_EMPL = C.EMPL_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM D ON A.PROD_DEPT = D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN HR_MASTXM E ON A.PROD_EMPL = E.EMPL_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM F ON A.CUST_CODE = F.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CUSTXM G ON A.CTIM_CODE = G.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_CODEXM H ON A.STAT_FLAG = H.ITEM_CODE AND H.CLAS_CODE = '04' WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB#

SELECT /* PDMC0030.SEARCH05.제작물 파일관리*//* [제작물파일 관리 조회] */ A.JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,A.FILE_NUMB /* 파일번호 */ ,A.REGI_DATE /* 등록일 */ ,A.FILE_NAME /* 파일명 */ ,A.MEMO_FILD /* 비고 */ ,A.URLX_NAME /* 기타url*/ ,A.FILE_IDXX /* 파일ID */ ,B.FILE_PATH /* 저장경로 */ ,B.PFIL_NAME /* 물리파일명 */ ,B.LFIL_NAME /* 논리파일명 */ , CASE WHEN B.PFIL_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN '파일 다운로드' ELSE '' END AS DOWNLOAD /*다운로드 버튼 이미지 URL*/ ,B.EXTN_NAME /* 확장자 */ FROM PD_FILEXD A LEFT JOIN TM_AFILED B ON A.FILE_IDXX = B.FILE_IDXX WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB#
SELECT CLAS_TYPE ,HIGH_LEVL AS COMB_CODE /*대분류코드*/ ,HIGH_NAME AS COMB_NAME /*대분류명*/ FROM PD_ITEMXH GROUP BY CLAS_TYPE,HIGH_LEVL, HIGH_NAME
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PD_FILEXD ( /* PDMC0030.SAVE00.제작물 관리 탭 저장*//* [제작물관리 저장] */ JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,FILE_NUMB /* 파일번호 */ ,REGI_DATE /* 생성일자 */ ,URLX_NAME /* 기타URL */ ,MEMO_FILD /* 비고 */ ,FILE_CONT /* 파일수 */ ,FILE_IDXX /* 파일ID */ ,FILE_NAME /* 파일명 */ ,REF1_FILD /* 여분1 */ ,REF2_FILD /* 여분2 */ ,REF3_FILD /* 여분3 */ ,REF4_FILD /* 여분4 */ ,REF5_FILD /* 여분5 */ ,INST_USID /* 생성자 */ ,INST_DATE /* 생성일자 */ ,UPDT_USID /* 수정자 */ ,UPDT_DATE /* 수정일자 */ ) VALUES ( #JOBN_NUMB# /* 제작번호 */ ,#FILE_NUMB# /* 파일번호 */ ,#REGI_DATE# /* 생성일자 */ ,#URLX_NAME# /* 기타URL */ ,#MEMO_FILD# /* 비고 */ ,#FILE_CONT# /* 파일수 */ ,#FILE_IDXX# /* 파일ID */ ,#FILE_NAME# /* 파일명 */ ,#REF1_FILD# /* 여분1 */ ,#REF2_FILD# /* 여분2 */ ,#REF3_FILD# /* 여분3 */ ,#REF4_FILD# /* 여분4 */ ,#REF5_FILD# /* 여분5 */ ,#UPDT_USID# /*입력작업자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일시*/ ,#UPDT_USID# /*수정작업자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*수정일시*/ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PD_FILEXD /* PDMC0030.UPDATE00.제작물 관리 탭 수정*//* [제작물관리 수정] */ SET JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB# /* 제작번호 */ , FILE_NUMB = #FILE_NUMB# /* 파일번호 */ , REGI_DATE = #REGI_DATE# /* 생성일자 */ , URLX_NAME = #URLX_NAME# /* 기타URL */ , MEMO_FILD = #MEMO_FILD# /* 비고 */ , FILE_CONT = #FILE_CONT# /* 파일수 */ , FILE_IDXX = #FILE_IDXX# /* 파일ID */ , FILE_NAME = #FILE_NAME# /* 파일명 */ , REF1_FILD = #REF1_FILD# /* 여분1 */ , REF2_FILD = #REF2_FILD# /* 여분2 */ , REF3_FILD = #REF3_FILD# /* 여분3 */ , REF4_FILD = #REF4_FILD# /* 여분4 */ , REF5_FILD = #REF5_FILD# /* 여분5 */ , UPDT_USID = #UPDT_USID# /*수정작업자*/ , UPDT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*수정일시*/ WHERE 1=1 AND FILE_NUMB = #FILE_NUMB#
